TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WmiWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider

summary.span: 实现将 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件映射到 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 事件的事件提供程序。

span.span: Implements an event provider that maps ASP.NET health-monitoring events to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. ASP.NET 使用此类运行状况监视事件映射到 WMI 事件。ASP.NET uses this class to map health-monitoring events to WMI events. 若要启用 WMI 子系统的 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件传送，您必须配置类添加中的相应设置``配置文件的部分。To enable the delivery of ASP.NET health-monitoring events to the WMI subsystem, you must configure the class by adding the appropriate settings in the `` section of the configuration file. Aspnet.mof 文件中包含的信息描述了 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件路由到时引发的 WMI 事件的参数类，并映射到 WMI 事件。The information contained in the Aspnet.mof file describes the parameters of the WMI events raised when ASP.NET health-monitoring events are routed to the class and mapped into WMI events. Aspnet.mof 文件存储在.NET Framework 生成目录，例如 %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*。The Aspnet.mof file is stored in the .NET Framework build directory, for example %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*. 有关报告运行状况监视事件作为 WMI 事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用 WMI 为提供 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10)。For more information about reporting health-monitoring events as WMI events, see [NIB: Using WMI to Deliver ASP.NET Health Monitoring Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10). > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统``配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅[如何： 实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 WMI 事件由 ASP.NET 运行状况监视 Web 应用程序运行状况事件由于颁发的使用者。The following example shows how to create a consumer of WMI events issued by ASP.NET health monitoring as a result of Web-application health events. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下已配置类和要监视的运行状况事件类型。The class and the health event types to monitor are already configured by default. 唯一需要执行是定义的所有运行状况事件规则。The only thing you need to do is to define the rule for all the health events. 请记住的运行状况事件仍未调度给默认提供程序。Remember that the health events are not dispatched to the provider by default. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider/CS/WmiWebEventListener.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider/VB/WmiWebEventListener.vb#1)] 下面的示例是演示的配置文件摘录``使 ASP.NET 能够使用的配置节提供程序来处理所有运行状况监视事件。The following example is a configuration file excerpt that shows a `` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the provider to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例类，但可以实现自己的提供程序类型继承的此类时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own provider type that inherits from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 从提供程序的缓冲区中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，所有提供程序的缓冲区中的事件将立即删除，无论自上次以来经过多长时间写入或多少个事件都是缓冲区中。When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately removed, regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last write or how many events are in the buffer. 最后一次写入时将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. 如果未启用缓冲机制，则调用此方法不起作用。Calling this method when the buffering mechanism is not enabled has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 对象，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A object that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法后调用构造函数。ASP.NET calls the method after calling the constructor. 此方法调用以初始化类的配置设置和配置文件中指定的名称。This method is called to initialize the class with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是，ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用以启动事件的处理方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

span.span: The event could not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法的应用程序域托管的 Web 应用程序终止时。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain that hosts the Web application terminates. 调用方法以执行任务，将允许应用程序正常结束。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
